current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Federal Reserve to make certain changes to the small bank holding company policy
			 statement on assessment of financial and managerial factors, and for other
			 purposes.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Changes required to small bank holding company policy statement on assessment of financial and
			 managerial factors

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(hereafter in this Act referred
			 to as the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Board
			 of Governors of the Federal Reserve System

text.#text: Before the end of the 6-month period beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act, the

quote.#tail:
) shall publish in the Federal
			 Register proposed revisions to the  Small Bank Holding Company Policy
			 Statement on Assessment of Financial and Managerial Factors (12 C.F.R.
			 part
			 225 appendix C) that provide that the policy shall apply to bank holding
			 companies and savings and loan holding companies which have pro forma
			 consolidated
			 assets of less than
			 $1,000,000,000 and that—

text.#text:
are not engaged in significant nonbanking activities either directly or through a nonbank
			 subsidiary;

do not conduct significant off-balance sheet activities  (including securitization and asset
			 management or administration) either directly or  through a nonbank
			 subsidiary; and

do not have a material amount of debt or equity securities outstanding (other than trust preferred
			 securities) that are registered with the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may exclude any bank holding company or savings and loan holding company,
			 regardless of asset size, from the policy statement under
determines that such action is warranted for supervisory purposes.

quote.#text: or small savings and loan holding company

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 171(b)(5)(C) of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act

text.#text: For the purposes of this Act:

term.#tail: has the same meaning  as in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 2 of the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956

term.#tail: has the same meaning as in
